Package oop

Class Hospital

java.lang.Object
oop.Hospital
public class Hospital extends Object
The Hospital class manages the operations and entities in a hospital system. It handles operations related to patients, staff, medicine inventory, replenishment requests, appointments, and available time slots for doctors. This class provides functionality for managing hospital data, including adding and removing staff members, updating staff information, handling patient registration, login, and managing medicine stock, replenishment requests, and appointments.
Since:
2024-11-09

    • processLoginPatient

      public static boolean processLoginPatient(BufferedReader reader, String id, String password, Patient matchedPatient, Scanner sc) throws IOException
      Processes login for a patient, verifying their ID and password.
      Parameters:
      reader - BufferedReader to read credentials.
      id - The patient ID.
      password - The password entered by the patient.
      matchedPatient - The patient object to match the ID with.
      sc - Scanner object for user input.
      Returns:
      true if login is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while reading the file.

    • processLoginHospitalStaff

      public static boolean processLoginHospitalStaff(BufferedReader reader, String id, String password, HospitalStaff matchedHospitalStaff, Scanner sc) throws IOException
      Processes login for a hospital staff member, verifying their ID and password.
      Parameters:
      reader - BufferedReader to read credentials.
      id - The staff ID.
      password - The password entered by the staff member.
      matchedHospitalStaff - The staff member object to match the ID with.
      sc - Scanner object for user input.
      Returns:
      true if login is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while reading the file.

    • addStaffMember

      public static void addStaffMember(String staffName, int age, String staffID, Gender gender, String role)
      Adds a new staff member to the hospital system.
      Parameters:
      staffName - The name of the new staff member.
      age - The age of the new staff member.
      staffID - The staff ID for the new staff member.
      gender - The gender of the new staff member.
      role - The role of the new staff member (either doctor or pharmacist).

    • getPatientNameFromPatientID

      public static String getPatientNameFromPatientID(String patientID)
      Retrieves the name of a patient using their patient ID.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient whose name is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The name of the patient if found, otherwise returns null.

    • getPatientFromPatientID

      public static Patient getPatientFromPatientID(String patientID)
      Retrieves the Patient object corresponding to a given patient ID.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Patient object if found, otherwise returns null.

    • checkStockAlert

      public static void checkStockAlert()
      Checks the inventory of medicines in the hospital and alerts if any medicine is low in stock. Compares the current stock of each medicine with its low stock threshold. Will be used as a system alert to the pharmacist/administrator upon their login.

    • checkPendingReplenishment

      public static void checkPendingReplenishment()
      Checks for any pending replenishment by the pharmacist. If there are, it will be printed out.

    • registerNewPatient

      public static void registerNewPatient()
      Registers a new patient by prompting for their personal and medical details, then adds the patient to the system and updates the CSV patient list records.

    • getLatestPatientID

      public static String getLatestPatientID()
      Retrieves the latest patient ID by scanning the CSV file and finding the latest existing ID.
      Returns:
      The next available patient ID.

    • updatePatientInCSV

      public static void updatePatientInCSV(String patientID, String name, LocalDate dateOfBirth, Gender gender, BloodType bloodType, String email)
      Updates the patient record in the CSV file with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The patient's ID.
      name - The patient's name.
      dateOfBirth - The patient's date of birth.
      gender - The patient's gender.
      bloodType - The patient's blood type.
      email - The patient's email address.

    • insertNewPatientCredentials

      public static void insertNewPatientCredentials(String id)
      Inserts the default credentials for a newly registered patient into the csv credentials file
      Parameters:
      id - The patient ID.
